channel.title: [Delta] My Shops aren't deleting coins when I buy an Item
channel.description: Ok, Well I recently added Donar points to my Delta source without a guide... So to make sure I didn't fuck anything up I went back and tested my regular shops.. My PK Shop and My regular shops.. And then I noticed.. MY Regular shops don't delete the coins when I buy something.. But! I need to have the currect amount of coins to recieve the item. I tryed looking for the problem and I'm guessing it will be a easy fix probably just a deleteItem(995, Itemamount); or something IDK. So I need someones help. Thanks guys.!

item.title: [Delta] My Shops aren't deleting coins when I buy an Item
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Thanks, for helping me sorry I forgot to update I fixed it. Thank you though.
